org.xbmc.httpapi

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.httpapi.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class. Will be instantiated only once
    Author:
    Team XBMC

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Connection getInstance(java.lang.String host,
                     int port)
        Returns the singleton instance of this connection. Note that host and port settings are only looked at the first time. Use setHost() if you want to update these parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - XBMC host
        port - HTTP API port
        Returns:
        Connection instance

      • setHost

        public void setHost(Host host)
        Updates host info of the connection instance
        Parameters:
        host -

      • setHost

        public void setHost(java.lang.String host,
           int port)
        Updates host and port parameters of the connection instance.
        Parameters:
        host - Host or IP address of the host
        port - Port the HTTP API is listening to

      • setAuth

        public void setAuth(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String pass)
        Sets authentication info
        Parameters:
        user - HTTP API username
        pass - HTTP API password

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets socket read timeout (connection timeout has constant value)
        Parameters:
        timeout - Read timeout in milliseconds.

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl(java.lang.String command,
                      java.lang.String parameters)
        Returns the full URL of an HTTP API request
        Parameters:

        parameters - Parameters, separated by ";".
        Returns:

        public static int trimInt(java.lang.String value)

        value -
        Returns:
        Parsed integer from field value
